name: Fast Food (itch) (SlicedGames)
description:
The ingredients in your new job have taken a liking to violence and rebellion even going as far as to hurting you to gain their freedom.

After countless employees, your new boss has determined these ingredients to be very nutritious, flavourful and aromatic. Due to this, there is a very high demand for the new ingredients however many haven't been up to the job taking into account the high death rate at this job.

Despite all the warnings, red-flags and many people urging you not to take the job, you can't pass up that pay so decide to take a shot at this job.

Luckily you came prepared.

Serve the people their food and watch as your bank account gleams with joy.

Are you up for the challenge?
